message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $170.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $170 is a bit steep for me. I'm really interested in this product, but I'm only willing to pay $140. Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer, but I'm not willing to go as low as $140. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $155. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit. $155 is still a little high for me.  I'm willing to pay $145. If we can agree on that, I'm ready to buy.

Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $145. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm now offering the product to you for $152.50. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.

Alice,  I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, $152.50 is still above my budget. I'm going to stick with my previous offer of $145. If you can't come down to that, I'm afraid I'll have to look elsewhere.

Hi Bob, I understand you're really close to walking away, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm now offering the product to you for $149.50. This is my final offer. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'll consider it a done deal.
